title: Yunohana Tsubame
original_name: 湯の花つばめ, 澡堂西施
sinopse:
From Project Shueiguo:
After getting drunk, Chihara gets married to a complete stranger. Unbeknownst to her, the stranger is one of the Three Hot Takasuo Brothers from the neighbourhood bath house. Thus begins her crazy life with the Takasuo family...
